QuestData.Title: The Infested
QuestData.Description: I understand Kaz's desire to rescue her people, but her plan is reckless and she is not telling us everything.$b$bI came along to make sure she wasn't devising a plan against us and now I see this... this... horror.$b$bWhat did the botani do to these orcs?$b$bThese infested souls need to be put to rest. Give them peace.
QuestData.RewardText: These creatures... were not what I expected to see. I always knew Gorgrond to be a dangerous place, but I never could have guessed at how vile.$b$bThank you, commander, for your compassion in this.
